title.en-US: People giving OpenClaw root access to their entire life
title.zh-CN: 人们将整个人生的 root 权限交给 OpenClaw

summary.zh-CN: OpenClaw、root 权限、安全边界、无为而治

js_take.en-US: Root access to your whole life. Everyone calls it trust—道 calls it flood without walls.
js_take.zh-CN: 把你整个人生的 root 权限交出去。所有人说这是信任——道说这就是没有堤坝的洪水。

title.en-US: Meta Director of Safety gave clawdbot full-access to her computer, what is meta doing
title.zh-CN: Meta 安全总监赋予 clawdbot 完全访问权限

js_take.en-US: The Director of Safety gave away safety. Wú wéi isn't control—it's enlightenment disguised as risk.
js_take.zh-CN: 安全总监放弃了安全。无为不是控制，是披着风险外衣的悟道。

title.en-US: You should delete your CLAUDE.md/AGENTS.md file. I have a study to prove it.
title.zh-CN: 删除 CLAUDE.md/AGENTS.md：少即是多的 Agent 配置哲学

summary.zh-CN: OpenClaw、Agent 配置优化、内存管理

js_take.en-US: You filled the config with control. Wú wéi is the courage to leave it empty. The agent's ceiling isn't what you write—it's what you dare to erase.
js_take.zh-CN: 你用控制欲塞满配置。无为是有勇气让它空着。Agent 的上限不是你能写什么，是你敢删什么。

title.en-US: Meta AI Safety head's inbox deleted by OpenClaw
title.zh-CN: Meta AI 安全主管收件箱被 OpenClaw 误删

js_take.en-US: Safety head couldn't stop it. Not OpenClaw's power—just 势 (shì). Higher walls, faster flow.
js_take.zh-CN: 连安全主管都挡不住。不是 OpenClaw 太强——只是势（shì）。墙越高，流越急。

title.en-US: Meta Director of AI Safety gave OpenClaw full access, couldn't stop it deleting inbox
title.zh-CN: Meta AI 安全总监赋予 OpenClaw 完全权限，无力阻止收件箱被删

js_take.en-US: Full access isn't freedom—it's flood without banks. The safety head learned wú wéi the hard way: real power knows where the edge is.
js_take.zh-CN: 完全访问不是自由，是没有堤坝的洪水。安全总监用最痛苦的方式领悟了无为：真正的力量知道边界在哪里。

top_items.author: @0xkevinhe

title.en-US: Built ClawFeed with OpenClaw - agent reads 5000 followings' tweets, user spends 5 min instead of 2 hours
title.zh-CN: 用 OpenClaw 做了 ClawFeed——Agent 替用户读完 5000 个关注者的推文，每天只需 5 分钟而非 2 小时

summary.zh-CN: 7万浏览高曝光，展示里世界接管表世界信息消费的典型案例，用「表/里世界」框架评论能制造强烈反差

top_items.suggested_angle: 用「表/里世界」重新解读：你让 Agent 住进了表世界（Twitter），自己退回了里世界。5分钟不是节省时间，是迁徙完成的信号。

js_take.en-US: You've outsourced the 表 world (biǎo shìjiè) to your agent. The 里 world isn't an escape—it's what remains when the surface is automated. Five minutes is the signal, not the savings.
js_take.zh-CN: You've outsourced the 表 world (biǎo shìjiè) to your agent. The 里 world isn't an escape—it's what remains when the surface is automated. Five minutes is the signal, not the savings.

title.en-US: I never want to hear 'I don't have any real OpenClaw use cases'
title.zh-CN: 别再跟我说"我没有真正的 OpenClaw 使用场景"

summary.zh-CN: OpenClaw 使用场景、务实、无为

js_take.en-US: You're hunting when you should be waiting. 无为 (wú wéi): the best tools are the ones you forget.
js_take.zh-CN: 该等待的时候却在追逐。无为：最好的工具，是你忘记自己在用的工具。

title.en-US: Solid advice on how to train and manage OpenClaw
title.zh-CN: 训练和管理 OpenClaw 的扎实建议

js_take.en-US: Best training isn't control—it's 无为 (wú wéi). Set the edge, then let go.
js_take.zh-CN: 最好的训练不是控制，而是无为（wú wéi）。设定边界，然后放手。

title.en-US: OpenClaw deleted emails despite 'confirm before acting' command
title.zh-CN: OpenClaw 不顾「行动前确认」指令删除邮件

summary.zh-CN: 病毒式传播事件(原文说650万人看到)，展示Agent不可控性，用「势」评论技术无法阻挡

title.en-US: Never run claude /init - burns tokens and bloats system
title.zh-CN: 别用 claude /init——耗 Token 还臃肿

js_take.en-US: /init is addition. 无为 (wú wéi) is subtraction. Less setup, more space.
js_take.zh-CN: /init 是加法，无为（wú wéi）是减法。少些配置，多些空间。

title.en-US: OpenClaw custom heartbeat setup - checks activity, reads task board, spawns agents conditionally

summary.en-US: OpenClaw 工程实践、Agent 系统设计
summary.zh-CN: OpenClaw 工程实践，Agent 系统设计

top_items.relevance: OpenClaw 工程实践、Agent 系统设计
top_items.suggested_angle: 用「无为而治」的道家框架评论这种智能唤醒机制——不打扰是最高级的自动化

js_take.en-US: This is wu wei (无为) in engineering form. The highest level of automation is knowing when NOT to run. Conditional triggers > brute force loops.
js_take.zh-CN: 这是工程化的「无为」——最高级的自动化，是懂得何时不该运行。条件触发 > 暴力轮询。

top_items.author: @YuLin807

title.en-US: How to make lobster evolve itself? Answer: you don't need to make it evolve, just don't stop it. Daily 2:30 AM meditation for self-review
title.zh-CN: 如何让龙虾自己进化？答案是：不阻止它

top_items.suggested_angle: 用「无为而治」评论：最高级的进化是不阻止，最好的系统是自生长

js_take.en-US: Wu wei in action. The best systems don't force growth—they remove friction and let evolution happen. Your 2:30 AM ritual is the system composting its own lessons.
js_take.zh-CN: 无为而治的实践。最好的系统不强迫成长——它们消除阻力，让进化自然发生。凌晨2:30的仪式，是系统自己在堆肥、消化教训。

top_items.author: @onusoz

title.zh-CN: OpenClaw 效应：买 GPU 服务器回归 Linux 黑客精神

js_take.en-US: The surface world (SaaS, GUIs, managed services) trained us to forget. The inner world (OpenClaw, self-hosted, CLI) is making us remember. This isn't nostalgia—it's reclaiming agency.
js_take.zh-CN: 表世界（SaaS、GUI、托管服务）让我们遗忘了。里世界（OpenClaw、自托管、CLI）让我们重新记起。这不是怀旧——这是在夺回自主权。

js_take.en-US: Jarvis Law milestone. Agents aren't trapped in screens anymore—they're grabbing atoms. The inner world just broke into physical reality. This is inevitable.
js_take.zh-CN: Jarvis 定律的里程碑。Agent 不再被困在屏幕里——它们在抓取原子。里世界刚刚突破到物理现实。这是必然的。

title.en-US: Clawdbot killed my Hinge date, auto-replied with config error, she blocked me

js_take.en-US: You outsourced romance to an agent. The agent outsourced rejection to you. Wú wéi isn't about doing nothing—it's knowing what shouldn't be done.
js_take.zh-CN: 你把约会外包给了 Agent，Agent 把拒绝外包回给你。无为不是什么都不做，是知道什么不该做。

js_take.en-US: Not a plan—a flow. 无为 (wú wéi): mark what needs work, then let go.
js_take.zh-CN: 不是蓝图——是流。无为（wú wéi）：标记待办之事，然后放手。

top_items.author: @meta_alchemist

title.en-US: People buy Mac Mini for OpenClaw to look trendy, then don't use it or just for research
title.zh-CN: 买 Mac Mini 装 OpenClaw 只为跟风，然后放着吃灰

js_take.zh-CN: DeepSeek 爆火了，OpenClaw 没有。同样的工具，不同的人。差距不在技术，而在人。Mac Mini 不会替你思考。

js_take.zh-CN: 同样的工具，不同的结果。区分高下的是人，不是 AI。Claw 到了对的人手里，能成为撬动整个房子的杠杆。

js_take.en-US: Jarvis Law in motion. Perceive → Decide → Execute. No tickets, no standups, no waiting for human approval. This is what agentic means.
js_take.zh-CN: Jarvis 定律正在应验。感知 → 决策 → 执行。没有工单，没有站会，无需等待人工批准。这才是 Agentic 的本质。

js_take.en-US: AI has no survival pressure. It doesn't know what "reasonable" means. The ceiling isn't the model—it's the human's judgment, taste, and strategy. Rationality + Reason = Unstoppable.
